subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Michigan, which lost to N.J.I.T. and Eastern Michigan last month and lost Caris LeVert, a top player, this month, will continue to try to salvage its season on Saturday against Wisconsin.
snippet: Michigan, which lost to N.J.I.T. and Eastern Michigan last month and lost Caris LeVert, a top player, this month, will continue to try to salvage its season on Saturday against Wisconsin.
